components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description:
A microscope, as used in science laboratories to magnify small objects, such as cells or insects. Depicted as a compound opitical microscope with an adjustable eyepiece, lens, arm, and slide stage mounted on a base. Generally shown as metal with the viewing apparatus facing left.

Commonly used for various content concerning science and research. May also be used for various senses of inspection (e.g., taking a closer took).

Google’s design was previously shown in red.
components.title: Microscope

description: A man who is studying or has expert knowledge of one or more of the natural or physical sciences. Generally depicted wearing safety goggles and a white lab coat while holding a test tube filled with colorful liquid.
title: Man Scientist

emoji_net_data.definition: The Man Scientist emoji is a sequence of the ?? Man and ?? Microscope emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each char http://emojipedia.org/male-scientist/
emoji_net_data.name: man scientist

bn:03098987n: Person qualified or professionally engaged in engineering.

An engineer is a professional practitioner of engineering, concerned with applying scientific knowledge, mathematics, and ingenuity to develop solutions for technical, societal and commercial problems.
A person who is qualified or professionally engaged in any branch of engineering.
A profession that develops solutions to technical problems

bn:00053834n: Person with an extensive knowledge of mathematics
A mathematician is a person whose primary area of study and research is the field of mathematics.
A mathematician is a person with an extensive knowledge of mathematics who uses this knowledge in his work, typically to solve mathematical problems.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00069680n: A scientist, in a broad sense, is one engaging in a systematic activity to acquire knowledge.
A person with advanced knowledge of one or more sciences

One whose activities make use of the scientific method to answer questions regarding the measurable universe. A scientist may be involved in original research, or make use of the results of the research of others.
Someone who uses the scientific method professionally
Expert in at least one area of science who uses the scientific method to do research.
One whose activities make use of scientific method.
Scientists, in a broad sense, are persons engaged in the systematic activity to acquire knowledge.
